price: 7. ceux dont les convoitises vont au-delà (de ces limites), ceux-là sont les transgresseurs,
arabic: فَمَنِ ٱبۡتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡعَادُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: famani ib'taghā warāa dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-ʿādūna
